replies.body: Does this count as spam? It's utterly meaningless and doesn't add anything to anything at all

This is a really good discussion we should probably have as a community at some point.

The [board guidelines](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) say spamming only refers to posting the same content multiple times. There's nothing in the rules against _"shitposting"_ or posing meaningless content. So under the current rules this post is pretty much fine (it could possibly be removed for _"wrong category"_ but that's it).

Something we should also consider is the right to free speech. Should **QAPLA** be able to post as he pleases provided it doesn't harm or insult anyone?

I'd be more than happy to push for a boards rules amendment if you guys want it though. Maybe we could have a democratic poll?

Just sharing some thoughts :P
